properties.name: my.tst.closeBrowser
properties.description: Close chrome at the end of test.

properties.name: my.tst.monkeyTest.seed
properties.description: Seed for MonkeyTest round #0, if it needed. Or 0.

properties.name: my.tst.monkeyTest.rounds
properties.description: How many rounds Monkey Test must pass.

properties.name: my.tst.monkeyTest.steps
properties.description: How many steps in a round.

properties.name: my.tst.monkey.failImmediately
properties.description: Whether to stop Monkey Test on first fault.
